original: intros m z v j Hmap Hexd Hpred m0 t Hlt Hexpo Hnexpo. unfold bottom. simpl. destruct (eq_dart_dec v z) as [Heq | Hneq]. - reflexivity. - unfold m0. simpl. destruct (eq_dim_dec zero zero) as [Heqd | Hneqd]. + destruct (eq_dart_dec t (bottom m zero t)). * exfalso. apply Hnexpo. apply Hexpo. * reflexivity. + destruct (eq_dim_dec zero zero). * destruct (eq_dart_dec v (bottom m0 zero t)). ++ reflexivity. ++ apply Hneq.
